post.author: 김민
post.content:
The Length of the Contract is : 2 months The Pay is in the area of : $55-70/hour (Give or take) The Location is : Toronto (GTA) Client Site The Top Skills the client is looking for : Oracle, order management, R11i modules The Job Description is : This is an Oracle Gap-Fit assessment project. The person needs to be knowledgeable in the following process areas: modules: Order Mgmt, Order Capture, iStore, Advance Pricing. Activities: - Will be required to understand & document the clients current state business processes - Will need to develop appropriate future state processes based on new requirements and / or changes in business practices. - Conduct a gap analysis on how the Oracle application maps to the future state requirements Expertise: Solution and Applications Oracle Applications/Modules 3 -5 Years Essential oracle order management R11i **4-12 Months Essential
*** Please send your resumes to Shannenb@procom.ca ** NO PHONE CALLS PLEASE
post.title: Oracle Consultant by Procom
